name: TurretSnake
description:
Made in 100 minutes for the first 10^2 Jam.

The theme was Twisted Classics.

So... I give you Turret Snake! It's Snake, but the snake body has turrets on it, and they shoot enemies, and the enemies shoot you back to destroy your snake, ahhh!

Get the arbitrary number of 15 points to win! Go below 0 points and you lose!

WASD/Arrows to control the snake.

Mouse to target the turrets (they automatically fire)
